content.content: Hi, I thought it would be interesting if you implemented a feature where the system automatically undid a transaction if the funds haven’t been moved for a year or maybe burned
content.GPT-summary: The author is proposing a new feature for the system where transactions are automatically undone or burned if funds haven't been moved for a year. The post is explaining the proposal and a 3rd party is giving constructive criticism on the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: i dont think this seems fair, perhaps the holder just wants to hodl? and having such a system seems to be imposing on the user.
Hi, But wonder how many people have lost access to their coins. By implementing this feature your would increase the value of MKR if we assume total marked cap wouldn’t change
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
